1.caption_en:
Nike's four-step diagram illustrates the progression from isolated Nike+ offerings toward a fully integrated ecosystem, mapped across horizontal and vertical integration axes with orange arrows showing the strategic transitions. The image highlights repeated Nike+ product nodes (iPod, Website, SportBand, SportWatch GPS, Running App, Facebook, Fuel/FuelBand) across quadrants labeled Steps 1–4.

{
  "type": "diagram",
  "title": "And Nike continued to integrate vertically (technical focus) all the offerings to enhance the user experience following the functional integration strategy",
  "axes": {
    "x": "Horizontal Integration",
    "y": "Vertical integration"
  },
  "quadrants": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "position": "bottom-left",
      "label": "Step 1",
      "visible_nodes": [
        "Nike+ iPod",
        "Nike+ Website"
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "position": "bottom-right",
      "label": "Step 2",
      "visible_nodes": [
        "Nike+ iPod",
        "Nike+ Website",
        "Nike+ SportBand",
        "Nike+ SportWatch GPS",
        "Nike+ Running App",
        "Nike+ Facebook"
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "position": "top-left",
      "label": "Step 3",
      "visible_nodes": [
        "Nike+ iPod",
        "Nike+ Website",
        "Nike+ SportBand",
        "Nike+ SportWatch GPS",
        "Nike+ Running App",
        "Nike+ Facebook"
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": 4,
      "position": "top-right",
      "label": "Step 4",
      "visible_nodes": [
        "Nike+ iPod",
        "Nike+ Website",
        "Nike+ SportBand",
        "Nike+ SportWatch GPS",
        "Nike+ Running App",
        "Nike+ Facebook",
        "Nike+ FuelBand",
        "Nike+ Fuel"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "arrows": [
    {
      "from_quadrant": 1,
      "to_quadrant": 2,
      "style": "solid orange",
      "direction": "right",
      "meaning": "horizontal integration step from isolated offerings toward a more connected hub"
    },
    {
      "from_quadrant": 3,
      "to_quadrant": 4,
      "style": "solid orange",
      "direction": "right",
      "meaning": "horizontal integration at a higher level of vertical integration"
    },
    {
      "from_quadrant": 3,
      "to_quadrant": 2,
      "style": "solid orange (diagonal)",
      "direction": "down-right",
      "meaning": "integration pathway combining vertical consolidation with horizontal connections"
    }
  ],
  "annotations": {
    "steps_labelled": [1, 2, 3, 4],
    "legend": "Orange arrows indicate strategic transitions; nodes represent Nike+ products and services",
    "source_caption": "Source: Own analysis based on Book \"Connected by Design\""
  },
  "source": "Own analysis based on Book \"Connected by Design\""
}

3.caption_en:
A four-quadrant Nike+ ecosystem diagram showing central hubs connected to peripheral services (iPod, Website, SportBand, SportWatch GPS, Fuel, Facebook, Running App) with bold orange arrows indicating data flows across four numbered steps.

{
  "type": "diagram",
  "subtype": "four-quadrant flow diagram",
  "dimensions": { "width": 768, "height": 756 },
  "colors": ["orange", "light gray", "black"],
  "layout": "4 quadrants separated by dashed lines with a hub in each quadrant",
  "nodes": [
    {
      "id": "Q1_top_left",
      "quadrant": 1,
      "position": "top-left",
      "label": "Nike+ hub",
      "connections": ["Nike+ iPod", "Nike+ Website", "Nike+ SportBand", "Nike+ SportWatch GPS", "Nike+ Facebook", "Nike+ Running App"]
    },
    {
      "id": "Q2_top_right",
      "quadrant": 2,
      "position": "top-right",
      "label": "Nike+ hub (includes Fuel)",
      "connections": ["Nike+ Fuel", "Nike+ FuelBand", "Nike+ iPod", "Nike+ Website", "Nike+ SportBand", "Nike+ SportWatch GPS", "Nike+ Facebook", "Nike+ Running App"]
    },
    {
      "id": "Q3_bottom_left",
      "quadrant": 3,
      "position": "bottom-left",
      "label": "Nike+ hub",
      "connections": ["Nike+ iPod", "Nike+ Website"]
    },
    {
      "id": "Q4_bottom_right",
      "quadrant": 4,
      "position": "bottom-right",
      "label": "Nike+ hub",
      "connections": ["Nike+ iPod", "Nike+ Website", "Nike+ SportBand", "Nike+ SportWatch GPS"]
    }
  ],
  "arrows": [
    {
      "id": "A_top_horizontal",
      "style": "thick orange",
      "from": "Q1_top_left",
      "to": "Q2_top_right",
      "direction": "left-to-right",
      "description": "top horizontal arrow linking left and right top hubs"
    },
    {
      "id": "A_bottom_horizontal",
      "style": "thick orange",
      "from": "Q3_bottom_left",
      "to": "Q4_bottom_right",
      "direction": "left-to-right",
      "description": "bottom horizontal arrow linking left and right bottom hubs"
    },
    {
      "id": "A_long_diagonal_1",
      "style": "thick orange",
      "from": "Q2_top_right",
      "to": "Q1_top_left",
      "direction": "diagonal",
      "description": "long diagonal connection visible between top-right and top-left hubs"
    },
    {
      "id": "A_long_diagonal_2",
      "style": "thick orange",
      "from": "Q1_top_left",
      "to": "Q4_bottom_right",
      "direction": "diagonal",
      "description": "long diagonal connection visible between top-left and bottom-right hubs"
    }
  ],
  "text_elements": ["1. Step", "2. Step", "3. Step", "4. Step"],
  "detected_labels": ["Nike+ iPod", "Nike+ Website", "Nike+ SportBand", "Nike+ Fuel", "Nike+ FuelBand", "Nike+ SportWatch GPS", "Nike+ Facebook", "Nike+ Running App"],
  "ocr_confidence": "medium",
  "notes": "Diagram depicts four steps and multiple orange arrows indicating transfers or transitions between Nike+ hubs and their connected services."
}
